title: Ancient Temple Adventure #3
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Temple Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A grand entrance hall with towering stone columns covered in ancient hieroglyphs. Dust particles float in shafts of light streaming through cracks in the ceiling. Weathered statues of forgotten gods line the walls, their faces worn smooth by time. The air is cool and smells of earth and stone. Offerings of dried flowers and incense lie scattered on the floor.

items.name: stone pedestal
items.description: A carved pedestal in the center of the hall with a shallow basin on top

items.name: jade key
items.description: A small key carved from green jade with temple symbols

items.name: offering table
items.description: A low table with three compartments for sacred offerings

items.name: temple inscription tablet
items.description: A clay tablet with ancient writing
items.text: This sacred temple was consecrated in the year 1428 by High Priest Amun-Ra. The eternal flame burns in the sacred chamber, tended by the priests. Only those who understand the three sacred truths may approach the altar of the gods.

items.name: bronze key
items.description: A heavy bronze key with hieroglyphic engravings

items.name: statue alcove
items.description: A recessed alcove containing a statue of a jackal-headed god

items.name: priest's scroll
items.description: An ancient papyrus scroll
items.text: Sacred duties of the temple: The High Priest Amun-Ra guards the inner sanctum. The eternal flame must never be extinguished in the sacred chamber. The treasure vault holds our most precious relics. Remember: the year of consecration unlocks the offerings.

items.name: ceremonial chest
items.description: An ornate chest decorated with gold leaf and precious stones

items.name: golden ritual mask
items.description: A ceremonial mask worn by temple priests during sacred rites

items.name: temple map
items.description: A map showing the layout of the temple complex
items.text: Temple Layout: Entrance Hall leads to the Treasure Chamber. Beyond lies the Sacred Altar where the gods dwell. The eternal flame illuminates the path to enlightenment.

items.name: wall of hieroglyphs
items.description: A wall covered in carved symbols and ancient writing
items.text: The hieroglyphs tell the story of the temple's founding and the wisdom of High Priest Amun-Ra. They speak of sacred offerings made in the treasure chamber and the eternal flame that burns at the altar.

items.name: heavy stone door
items.description: A massive door carved with images of priests and gods, leading deeper into the temple

rooms.name: Treasure Chamber
rooms.description: A magnificent chamber filled with golden artifacts, jeweled statues, and ancient relics. Torches mounted in bronze sconces cast flickering light across walls painted with scenes of religious ceremonies. Clay jars and wooden chests line the perimeter. The scent of myrrh and frankincense hangs in the air. A sealed doorway to the north leads to the sacred altar.

items.name: golden statue of Ra
items.description: A life-sized statue of the sun god covered in gold leaf
items.text: Inscription at base: 'Ra, the eternal sun, whose light illuminates all. The sacred flame burns in his honor at the altar, tended by High Priest Amun-Ra.'

items.name: row of clay jars
items.description: Large jars sealed with wax, containing offerings and supplies

items.name: sacred papyrus
items.description: A well-preserved document with ritual instructions
items.text: Sacred Ritual Instructions: To enter the presence of the gods at the altar, one must answer the three questions of wisdom. Know the name of our High Priest, know where the eternal flame burns, and know what offerings we make to the gods.

items.name: jeweled treasure chest
items.description: A chest overflowing with gold coins, precious gems, and sacred artifacts

items.name: silver ankh
items.description: A sacred symbol of eternal life made from pure silver

items.name: offering shelf
items.description: A shelf displaying various offerings to the gods

items.name: bundle of sacred incense
items.description: Dried herbs and resins used in temple ceremonies

items.name: tablet of wisdom
items.description: A stone tablet with teachings inscribed upon it
items.text: The Three Sacred Truths: First - Our temple is guided by High Priest Amun-Ra. Second - The eternal flame burns forever in the sacred chamber. Third - We offer gold and incense to honor the gods.

items.name: ceremonial wall painting
items.description: A detailed mural showing priests making offerings at an altar
items.text: The painting depicts priests carrying gold and incense to the sacred altar where the eternal flame burns. High Priest Amun-Ra stands before the flame, arms raised in prayer.

items.name: sealed altar door
items.description: An imposing door sealed with divine magic. Three questions are carved into the stone surface in ancient script.

password_questions.question: Who is the High Priest of this temple?
password_questions.hint: Check the temple inscription and the wisdom tablet

password_questions.question: Where does the eternal flame burn?
password_questions.hint: Multiple texts mention where the flame is located

password_questions.question: What offerings do we make to the gods?
password_questions.hint: The wisdom tablet and wall painting show what is offered

rooms.name: Sacred Altar of the Gods
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the ancient temple! A magnificent altar stands before you, carved from a single block of white marble. The eternal flame burns in a golden brazier, casting dancing shadows on walls covered in sacred hieroglyphs. Shafts of sunlight pour through an opening in the ceiling, illuminating a hidden stairway that leads up to freedom. The presence of the divine fills this sacred space.

items.name: sacred marble altar
items.description: A pristine white altar where offerings are made to the gods

items.name: eternal flame
items.description: A flame that has burned for centuries, never extinguishing
items.text: The flame burns with a pure, golden light. It is said that as long as this flame burns, the temple and its wisdom will endure.

items.name: golden brazier
items.description: An ornate brazier holding the eternal flame, decorated with images of the sun god

items.name: wall of sacred hieroglyphs
items.description: The final teachings of the temple, carved into the walls
items.text: You who have reached this sacred place have proven your wisdom and devotion. The gods smile upon you. May you carry the light of knowledge into the world beyond.

rooms.win_message: You have reached the Sacred Altar and proven yourself worthy! The eternal flame blazes brightly in recognition of your achievement. As you climb the hidden stairway revealed by the sunlight, you emerge from the ancient temple into the fresh air and freedom. The wisdom of the ancients is now yours to keep. You win!
